rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 2 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:53 PM, 13 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Laguna, Batangas, Rizal and Metro Manila within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Quezon(Tagkawayan, Calauag, Quezon, Guinayangan) and Cavite(Imus, Kawit) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
